t: 21 Major Tire Brands Of 2025 Ranked - SlashGear
s: April 24, 2025 - Pirelli is one of the biggest and most popular tire makers in the world for enthusiasts, but it also makes good everyday tires as well. The brand was founded in Italy in 1872 and have been making tires ever since. It's also known for being the only tire used by Formula 1 drivers.
